modal.title: What time is the presentation starting?

picture.text1: We will take pictures and upload to SNS.
picture.text2: If you don't like, don't hesitate to tell us.

question.text1: We have Q&A time after each presentation.
question.text2: Please feel free to ask any questions.

feedback.text1: Please fill out the feed back form for presenters.
feedback.text2: Don't forget to write your name on the space provided.
